phrs.translation: 呆板的, 形式主义的, 形式主义
传统生活方式, 正规生活方式

sentences.sentence: The latter has made scientific positiveness a feature of Russian formalistic criticism.
sentences.translation: 由于有后一种美学基础，俄国形式主义批评就具有科学实证的特点。

sentences.sentence: The value of military law consists of the internal value, external value and formalistic value of military law.
sentences.translation: 军事法价值是军事法的内在价值、外显价值和形式价值的有机统一。

sentences.sentence: The writer opposes the new formalistic tendency of the style of architecture caused by the Westernized Architecture.
sentences.translation: 笔者反对“洋风”建筑所带来的新一轮形式主义的建筑风格取向。
